message: Starting research on tmux session management best practices

Completed web research on tmux best practices. Found key info on: graceful vs forceful termination, libtmux library for Python, automated cleanup patterns, and resource management. Now creating comprehensive documentation.

COMPLETED: Researched tmux best practices via 6 web searches. Created comprehensive 859-line TMUX_BEST_PRACTICES.md (24KB) with: (1) Graceful vs forceful termination methods, (2) Orphaned/zombie session detection, (3) Python integration with libtmux library, (4) File handle leak prevention, (5) Automated cleanup patterns, (6) Code examples and implementation recommendations, (7) Specific fixes for Claude Orchestrator issues. Reported 6 critical findings to coordinate with other agents.
